thread.title: Northwell Health buys naming rights for Jones Beach Theater
thread.title_full: Northwell Health buys naming rights for Jones Beach Theater | Newsday

author: David Reich-Hale
title: Northwell Health buys naming rights for Jones Beach Theater
text:
Northwell Health announced on Monday, Feb. 6, 2017, that it had bought the naming rights for Jones Beach Theater, replacing Nikon as the theater's title sponsor. Above, an aerial view of the theater on April 19, 2015. (Credit: FlyingDogPhotos.com / Kevin Coughlin) 

Northwell Health has bought naming rights for Jones Beach Theater.
The health care system said Monday that it had signed a three-year deal with a two-year renewal option to become the exclusive title sponsor of the theater. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed.
Effective immediately, the 65-year-old venue is named the Northwell Health at Jones Beach Theater. Live Nation, an...
